title: Wanting to trade low condition turkey reds

posts.post_title: Wanting to trade low condition turkey reds
posts.post_content:
I have the following TURKEY REDS to trade. Hoping to trade 1 for 1 for likewise cubs turkey reds or 2 for 1 for a slightlybetter cub. Also looking for Herzog/Jordan, Larry Doyle and Bill Carrigan. Email me at [url]milkit1@gmail.com[/url]
